hrmclass module¶

class hrmclass.HrmClass(name, time, voltage, interval=[0, 0], logger=None)¶

Bases: object

Class that takes in name of original file and time and voltage vectors and then calculates various heart rate monitor-related data.

Attributes:
attr1 (str): name of file attr2 (numpy.array(float)): time vector for the ECG strip attr3 (numpy.array(float)): voltage vector for the ECG strip attr4 (list(float)): [begin time, end time] of interval in sec
Raises:
  • TypeError – error raised if any input is not of correct type
  • ValueError – error raised if any input does not have right value
beat_times()¶

Function that gives a numpy array of the times when a beat occurred by using normalized autocorrelation.

beats = None¶

numpy array of times when a beat occurred

duration = None¶

float: time duration of the EKG strip

how_long()¶

Function that gives the duration (sec) of the EKG

interval = None¶

list(float): [begin, end] of interval in sec

mean_bpm()¶

Function that estimates average BPM within self.interval

mean_hr_bpm = None¶

float: estimated average heart rate over a user-specified number of minutes (can choose a default interval)

minMaxVoltage()¶

Function that gives the minimum and maximum voltage signal from the EKG

name = None¶

str: name of file

num_beats = None¶

int: number of detected beats in the strip

time = None¶

numpy array(float): time vector for the ECG strip

voltage = None¶

numpy array(float): voltage vector for the ECG strip

voltage_extremes = None¶

tuple(float): containing minimum and maximum lead voltages

hrmclass.logs()¶
